Hey guys Iâ€™ve recently started posting on this forum after lurking for years. Iâ€™m having a really tough time writing this as itâ€™s all so fresh, excellent child hood, cruised through high school got along with all crowds great confidence etc, ended moved away video games for 2.5 years all I did was go gym twice a day (weights) eat and play video games walked my dog on the beach, I spiralled into a shell of a person I hit a low point picked myself up got a job 3 years of hard work later threw in the towel left my job broke up with my girlfriend of 3 years whom I just got a house with left before I finished my trade went travelling drugs + alcohol for a few weeks realised I made a huge mistake begged for her back she didnâ€™t want me tried to pursue her for 6+ months just sat back let her do her thing when it was actually killing me inside because hey I dumped her right? We ended up talking again and she wanted to see me overseas so I went and saw her she set me up treated me so nice first week then it all changed and she absolutely destroyed me and ultimately I went home rock bottom devastated did the whole thing again got a job decided to finish my trade 4 months later finally being happy with my great group of mates and family she comes back says it all different sheâ€™s so sorry didnâ€™t realise blah blah blah I get back with her because A. I bloody love her B. I was weak.  Fast forward 6 months toxic terrible relationship worst Iâ€™ve ever felt lost my job dismissed in a very nasty outcome I lost 15 kg my mind and any reasons to carry on. believed I genuinely wasnâ€™t good at my job I was the problem in the relationship it was all my fault etc. Last Monday I lost my job, last night I broke up with my girlfriend of over 4.5 years. And cried for 6 hours until I slept. 


Ive sat back and decided what Iâ€™m going to do, Ive made goals a plan Iâ€™m taking it step by step Iâ€™m trying to eat food regularly, Iâ€™ve got a new job lined up after a few weeks holiday with a guy I know whoâ€™s great, Iâ€™ve seen a friend every day this week and to be honest Iâ€™ve never felt better ever since I was about 18 years old. I have achieved more in the last week than I have in the last 4 years of my life. I am a quarter century old, Iâ€™m going to look back and be so happy I didnâ€™t waste it till 30. Iâ€™ve wasted half my 20s and made a lot of terrible decisions in my life and thank you to who ever is looking out for me where ever you are. If it wasnâ€™t for such a great family and friend system I really donâ€™t think I would be here. Sometimes you need to be pushed and hurt so much to make the decisions you truly want. If I had any advice from all of this Iâ€™d say be a bit more selfish especially when youâ€™re younger. You wonâ€™t know what you truly want until later or maybe you will but donâ€™t let someone or something hold you back from that. Stay true to yourself because youâ€™re the best judge of yourself no one knows you more than you. Keep your family close and good friends close also. I treat everybody the same now no matter what until they show me otherwise. If anyone ever wants to talk or anything no matter the subject time day weather what ever Iâ€™ll reply when I can. Iâ€™ve realised Iâ€™m a people person and I get joy out of lifting people up on my level. Letâ€™s all continue to fight the good fight and remember even when we feel our lowest and no one would even care thereâ€™s people out there who would. I AM ONE OF THEM. Donâ€™t make a permanent decision on a warped idea made up by a liar in your head. Im genuinely so happy and seeing things so much clearer and please hit me up so I can try help you see the same. 

Iâ€™m so greatful for the people around me who pushed me into the right decisions, Iâ€™m no professional by all means but I sure can give you a lot of yes noâ€™s and maybes about my situations. All the best! Not long until a new year I know we can start at anytime but next year can always be the one year that starts it all.
